</P>
<P ID=PARA15 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	As a follow-up to our conversation of today,this letter is to confirm our offer of employment with Spartan Motors, Inc. in the position of Vice President, New Business Development &amp; Joint Ventures reportingto Daryl Adams, Chief Operating Officer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA16 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA17 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The followingoutlines the components of our offer of employment:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA18 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA19 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Your bi-weekly base salary will be $8,077 which annualized equals $210,000. You will receive a guaranteed minimum increase of 3% in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA20 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA21 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	You will be eligible to participate in the Annual Incentive Compensation Plan. This incentive bonus is based upon the corporation&#39;s overall financial performance and performance to operational objectives. The target level for this bonus in your position is 35% of your annual base sa.lary. The actual payout depends on the company&#39;s financial performance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA22 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA23 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	You will also be eligible to participate in the Annual Long Term Incentive Plan ("annual stock award") for restricted stock grants valued at an equivalent amount of 30% of your annual base salary. These discretionary performance based awards are to be granted by the Spartan Motors Board of Directors on an annual basis. Restricted stock grants are awarded solely within the discretion of the Spartan Motors board, and are not guaranteed. Restricted stock grants are subject to the terms of the applicable Company stock plan. This stock will be fully vested over a three (3) year period. Your first eligibility for this stock grant will be in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA24 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA25 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Sign-on Bonus -Spartan is offering a one-time sign on bonus in the amount of $10,000 which will be paid within thirty (30) days of your hire. Should you leave Spartan prior to two (2) years, the sign-on would be repaid on a pro rata basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA73.1 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID=PGBK73 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID=PGFTR73 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV ID=PGNUM73 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE>
<A NAME="eolPage106"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR73 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA73.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<P ID=PARA76 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
<IMG STYLE="WIDTH: 575PT" SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/09/0001437749-16-027109_SPARTANLOGO2.JPG">
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA30 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	You will receive (4) four weeks of vacation benefits upon your date of hire and will accrue bi- weekly at the rate of 6.16 thereafter. The vacation period is the calendar year. If your employment ends within one year of your date of hire (with or without cause), you will not be paid for the unused vacation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA31 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA32 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Spartan Motors will pay for reasonable relocation costs associated with your family&#39;s move to the mid-Michigan region according to the Company&#39;s executive relocation guidelines. This will include moving of your household items,house-hunting trips and closing costs. This relocation offer will expire one year from your hire date. In addition, should you voluntarily leave Spartan Motors within your first year of employment; you will be required to repay any relocation costs paid.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA33 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA34 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Absent employee misconduct, in the event your employment with Spartan Motors is involuntarily terminated, you will be eligible to-receive a one (1) year severance .
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA35 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA36 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	You will also be eligible for our medical benefits 61calendar days from your date of hire. Spartan Motors offers one PPO plan and a High Deductible Plan with an HSA. There are also Dental and Vision plans available separate from the health plan offerings. If you are in need of COBRA coverage for two months,we w ill reimburse you the two month cost.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA37 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA38 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	You will also be automatically enrolled at 3% in the Spartan Motors Retirement Plan, a 401(k) Plan, the first day of the month following sixty {60) days of employment . Spartan Motors matches 25% of the associate&#39;s contribution up to the first 6%. If you have an existing balance in a 401(k) plan and wish to roll it over,information can be obtained from our Human Resources Department.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA39 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA40 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Your employment with the Company will be "at will," meaning that either you or the Company will be entitled to terminate your employment at any time and for any reason, with or without cause and with or without notice, without liability to you other than as expressly provided in this agreement. Any contrary representations, which may have been made to you, are superseded by this offer. This is the full and complete agreement between you and the Company on this matter. Although your job duties, title, compensation and benefits, as well as the Company personnel policies and procedures,may change from time to time (subject to your rights hereunder in any such event), the "at will" nature of your employment may only be changed in an express written agreement signed by you and a duly authorized member of the Compensation Committee ofthe Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA41 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA42 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	By signing this letter agreement, you represent and warrant to the Company that you are under no contractual commitments inconsistent with your obligations to the Company. While you are a full time employee at the Company, you will abide by your duty of loyalty to the Company and will devote your full time, energy and attention to the interests of the Company,subject to your devotion of time to manage your personal assets and investments, to participate in charitable, professional and community activities and to service on boards of directors of other companies, provided such devotion of time does not materially interfere with your service to the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA74.1 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>

<P ID=PARA51 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">

<P ID=PARA21 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">

	3002 Majestic Oaks Drive
</FONT>
</P>

These discretionary performance based awards are to be granted by the Spartan Motors Board of Directors on an annual basis. Restricted stock grants are awarded solely within the discretion of the Spartan Motors Board, and are not guaranteed. Restricted stock grants are subject to the terms of the applicable Company stock plan. This stock will be fully vested over a three (3) year period. Your first eligibility for this stock grant will be in 2015.

<EFX_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY>
<A NAME="FIS_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY"></A>
<P ID=PARA5409 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">

</B>

</P>
<P ID=PARA5410 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5411 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The undersigned, in his or her capacity as a director or officer, or both, as the case may be, of Spartan Motors, Inc., does hereby appoint Daryl M. Adams, Frederick J. Sohm, and Thomas&nbsp;T. Kivell, and each of them, his attorney, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for such individual and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc. for its fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, together with any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and all documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA5439 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The undersigned, in his or her capacity as a director or officer, or both, as the case may be, of Spartan Motors, Inc., does hereby appoint Daryl M. Adams, Frederick J. Sohm, and Thomas&nbsp;T. Kivell, and each of them, his attorney, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for such individual and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc. for its fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, together with any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and all documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
</FONT>

<P ID=PARA5492 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5493 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5494 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The undersigned, in his or her capacity as a director or officer, or both, as the case may be, of Spartan Motors, Inc., does hereby appoint Daryl M. Adams, Frederick J. Sohm, and Thomas&nbsp;T. Kivell, and each of them, his attorney, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for such individual and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc. for its fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, together with any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and all documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
</FONT>
</P>

<P ID=PARA2.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">

<P ID=PARA5573 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5574 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5575 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The undersigned, in his or her capacity as a director or officer, or both, as the case may be, of Spartan Motors, Inc., does hereby appoint Daryl M. Adams, Frederick J. Sohm, and Thomas&nbsp;T. Kivell, and each of them, his attorney, with full power of substitution and resubstitution, for such individual and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign the Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc. for its fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, together with any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and all documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="EX31-1_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	EXHIBIT 31.1
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P ID=PARA5656 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	CEO CERTIFICATION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5657 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5658 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	I, Daryl M. Adams, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5659 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5660 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5661 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5662 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this annual report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5663 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5664 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5665 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5666 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	4. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)&nbsp;and 15d-15(e))&nbsp;and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f))&nbsp;for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5667 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5668 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)&nbsp;Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5669 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5670 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)&nbsp;Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5671 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5672 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(c)&nbsp;Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5673 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5674 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(d)&nbsp;Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report)&nbsp;that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5675 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5676 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5677 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5678 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)&nbsp;All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5679 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5680 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)&nbsp;Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5681 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=TBL5686 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5682 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Date: March 9, 2016
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID">
<P ID=PARA5683 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	/s/ Daryl M. Adams
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5684 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA5685 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Daryl M. Adams
<BR>
	President and Chief Executive Officer
<BR>
	Spartan Motors, Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	EXHIBIT 31.2
</B>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P ID=PARA5690 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	CFO CERTIFICATION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5691 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5692 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	I, Frederick J. Sohm, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5693 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5694 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Spartan Motors, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5695 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5696 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this annual report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5697 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5698 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5699 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5700 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	4. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)&nbsp;and 15d-15(e))&nbsp;and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f))&nbsp;for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5701 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5702 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)&nbsp;Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5703 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5704 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)&nbsp;Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5705 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5706 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(c)&nbsp;Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5707 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5708 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(d)&nbsp;Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report)&nbsp;that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5709 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5710 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5711 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5712 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)&nbsp;All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5713 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.45PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5714 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 37.4PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)&nbsp;Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA5715 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
